name: Kill Bot
description:
For Siberian Game Jam Team: pnk

Maxim Kolotovkin (maxim218) - Unity and C# developer

Nina Kuklina (akenoq) - 3D and 2D artist

Jam theme

Humanity is ruled by angry bots.

They eat children and start arrays from the first element
(not from zero element).

Bots should be killed. Main reason - arrays.

Only one tank can save the humanity,
and you are the commander of the tank team.


Gameplay description

You play as a tank.
You need to collect 5 emoticons on the map.
During the game, evil robots will shoot at you.
At the end of your health reserve, the game ends.

Control

Hero Movement: W A S D
Change camera view: R
Bullet shooting: left mouse button

Enemy generation

The enemy's generation point is a house with a door.
The player can go to the house and close the door (the door will close automatically when the player is near).
When the enemy is generated again, he will be in closed house, which will prevent him from attacking the player.

Music sources

audio from the game Tekken 5
